医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加州州长签署法律禁止信用报告中包含医疗债务根据加州州长加文·纽瑟姆周二签署的立法，背负医疗债务的加州人将不再需要担心信用报告中出现未付的医疗账单，该法案使美国人口最多的州加入到保护因无法负担医疗费用而受到挤压的消费者的不断努力中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/California-Governor-signs-law-banning-medical-debt-from-credit-reports.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/California-Governor-signs-law-banning-medical-debt-from-credit-reports.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6b77491-efcc-41f6-afd8-d3143b0837a6 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 22:44:47 -0400 California Governor signs law banning medical debt from credit reports
研究显示 2019 年至 2022 年间与微型移动车辆相关的伤害急剧增加哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的一项新研究显示，2019 年至 2022 年间，电动自行车和电动滑板车受伤率分别激增 293% 和 88%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-reveals-sharp-increase-in-micromobility-vehicle-lated-injuries- Between-2019-and-2022.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-reveals-sharp-increase-in-micromobility-vehicle-lated-injuries- Between-2019-and-2022.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6598c11-36b4-439e-a1a3-98184d794b6b Tue, 24 Sep 2024 22:41:07 -0400 Study reveals sharp increase in micromobility vehicle-related injuries between 2019 and 2022
研究表明青少年糖尿病前期与晚年怀孕风险增加有关哥伦比亚梅尔曼公共卫生学院和西奈山医学院进行的新研究表明，年轻人的糖尿病前期与晚年不良妊娠结局之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-links-youth-prediabetes-to-increased-pregnancy-risks-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-links-youth-prediabetes-to-increased-pregnancy-risks-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=504c355e-9aaa-4aa6-bde7-fee39999328f Tue, 24 Sep 2024 22:36:42 -0400 Study links youth prediabetes to increased pregnancy risks later in life
FDA 新奖项推动了对常染色体显性肾小管间质性肾病的研究关键路径研究所 (C-Path) 很高兴地宣布，其多囊肾病结果联盟 (PKDOC) 已获得美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 颁发的以常染色体显性遗传性肾小管间质性肾病 (ADTKD) 为重点的广泛机构公告 (BAA) 合同）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-FDA-award-fuels-research-into-autosomal-dominant-tubulointerstitial-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-FDA-award-fuels-research-into-autosomal-dominant-tubulointerstitial-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f137e8b-bf9a-44b8-8c98-11fb6870010a Tue, 24 Sep 2024 22:29:39 -0400 New FDA award fuels research into autosomal dominant tubulointerstitial kidney disease
B-ALL 治疗新方法减少副作用并提高生存率圣裘德儿童研究医院的临床试验结果表明，使用基因组学和早期治疗反应来指导 B 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病 (B-ALL) 儿童的风险分类是有益的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-approach-to-B-ALL-treatment-reduces-side-effects-and-enhances-survival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-approach-to-B-ALL-treatment-reduces-side-effects-and-enhances-survival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34c4b2d4-c1b8-4691-ad2f-6bce9458315b Tue, 24 Sep 2024 21:46:39 -0400 New approach to B-ALL treatment reduces side effects and enhances survival
新发现揭示了情绪如何增强对情境细节的记忆贝克曼高级科学技术研究所的研究人员证明，情绪可以增强对上下文细节的记忆，挑战了情绪会损害记住此类信息的能力的观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-findings-reveal-how-emotion-enhances-memory-for-contextual-details.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-findings-reveal-how-emotion-enhances-memory-for-contextual-details.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=652c8828-a94d-4e9b-a755-ca9af3ca91c2 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 21:36:09 -0400 New findings reveal how emotion enhances memory for contextual details
索马鲁肽有望治疗肥胖患者的慢性皮肤病今天在欧洲皮肤病学和性病学会 (EADV) 2024 年大会上发表的一项开创性研究表明，索马鲁肽在治疗肥胖症患者化脓性汗腺炎 (HS) 方面具有巨大潜力，这是一种常见的慢性皮肤病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Semaglutide-shows-promise-in-treating-chronic-skin-condition-in-obese-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Semaglutide-shows-promise-in-treating-chronic-skin-condition-in-obese-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99a9ed32-98a8-4761-b14b-7d95462c21d7 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 21:27:09 -0400 Semaglutide shows promise in treating chronic skin condition in obese patients
到 2050 年，全球儿童和青少年近视患病率预计将超过 7.4 亿一项对现有证据的汇总数据分析发现，全球大约有三分之一的儿童和青少年患有近视，到 2050 年，该年龄段的全球近视患病率将达到 7.4 亿例。英国眼科杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Global-myopia-prevalence-among-children-and-teens-set-to-surpass-740-million-by-2050.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Global-myopia-prevalence-among-children-and-teens-set-to-surpass-740-million-by-2050.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1d22e69-a9e0-4df8-a583-d409f8b371b5 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 21:22:38 -0400 Global myopia prevalence among children and teens set to surpass 740 million by 2050
音乐疗法改善早产儿的睡眠和舒适度每日音乐干预显着改善早产儿的舒适度和睡眠过渡，而不影响生理稳定性。这项研究强调了非药物音乐疗法在新生儿护理中的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Music-therapy-improves-sleep-and-comfort-in-preterm-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Music-therapy-improves-sleep-and-comfort-in-preterm-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1129ac6e-44b3-4b42-8bd6-0221df03e06d Tue, 24 Sep 2024 20:36:00 -0400 Music therapy improves sleep and comfort in preterm infants
有针对性的肥胖计划可降低儿童与脂质相关的心脏病风险研究人员评估肥胖儿童和青少年的血脂状况及其对健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Targeted-obesity-programs-reduce-lipid-lated-heart-disease-risk-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Targeted-obesity-programs-reduce-lipid-lated-heart-disease-risk-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abf12b74-42f0-48d6-b944-5bc69cc994e0 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 20:07:00 -0400 Targeted obesity programs reduce lipid-related heart disease risk in children
